plot outline: N. Venkateswara Rao a.k.a. Venky (Naga Shourya) works in UB TV and his aspiration is to become a news reader just like his father N. Bhanu Murthy who discontinued his work as a news reader in Doordarshan after entry of new channels and a paralysis attack. However he is unable to reach his target and he has a strong contender for the job of news reader in the form of Vamana Rao (Posani Krishna Murali). Till then, he works for Teleshopping advertisements for nearly 4 years in UB TV. Moreover, his overbearing boss Uday Bhaskar a.k.a. Uday (Srinivas Avasarala) is jealous of Venky as Venky could easily communicate with girls which Uday could never do. Thus he turns a roadblock in Venky's aim to become a news reader. After rejecting many marriage proposals, Uday accepts to marry a Dentist Sirisha. After their first meet, Sirisha wants to meet Uday again for better understanding and since Uday is not good in communication with ladies, he takes the help of Venky and asks him some suggestions. While returning to their homes, Uday asks Venky about his comfortable approach towards girls and asks his love story if any. Venky narrates his love story. Venky then says how he happened to meet Sri Sai Sirisha Prabhavathi a.k.a. Prabha (Rashi Khanna), a Delhi based girl who too came for a vacation to Vishakapatnam in 2009. They meet in a theater and they come to know that they reside in the same apartment but in different flats. How Venky and Uday fall in love with Prabha and whether Prabha falls in love with Venky or Uday is the story.
title: Oohalu Gusagusalade
plot: Venky, who aspires to become a news reader, must face the challenges posed by his boss, Uday. Things get worse when Uday seeks Venky's help to woo a girl in return for his desired post.

N. Venkateswara Rao a.k.a. Venky (Naga Shourya) works in UB TV and his aspiration is to become a news reader just like his father N. Bhanu Murthy who discontinued his work as a news reader in Doordarshan after entry of new channels and a paralysis attack. However he is unable to reach his target and he has a strong contender for the job of news reader in the form of Vamana Rao (Posani Krishna Murali). Till then, he works for Teleshopping advertisements for nearly 4 years in UB TV. Moreover, his overbearing boss Uday Bhaskar a.k.a. Uday (Srinivas Avasarala) is jealous of Venky as Venky could easily communicate with girls which Uday could never do. Thus he turns a roadblock in Venky's aim to become a news reader. After rejecting many marriage proposals, Uday accepts to marry a Dentist Sirisha. After their first meet, Sirisha wants to meet Uday again for better understanding and since Uday is not good in communication with ladies, he takes the help of Venky and asks him some suggestions. While returning to their homes, Uday asks Venky about his comfortable approach towards girls and asks his love story if any. Venky narrates his love story. Venky then says how he happened to meet Sri Sai Sirisha Prabhavathi a.k.a. Prabha (Rashi Khanna), a Delhi based girl who too came for a vacation to Vishakapatnam in 2009. They meet in a theater and they come to know that they reside in the same apartment but in different flats. How Venky and Uday fall in love with Prabha and whether Prabha falls in love with Venky or Uday is the story.::Wiki

Venky, an aspiring news reader, agrees to help his boss Uday to woo Prabha to marry him. Venky's troubles start when he learns Prabha is his Ex. The story takes a funny turn when Prabha reveals she still has feelings for Venky and he finds his boss's villainous intentions.::Ajay

A sweet, charming young man from Hyderabad meets, befriends and falls madly in love with a bold, beautiful and spirited young woman from Delhi. This movie plots the journey of their love, and the complications brought about by the machiavellian mission of one man who is hellbent on keeping them apart. Will true love succeed in the end?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
